title: Oversized tubs in bathrooms
posting_body: Clarendon Apartments is an upscale urban apartment community located on 4.3 acres in the heart of Woodland Hills, California.
You will enjoy close proximity to Warner Center, downtown Los Angeles and the world famous Pacific Coast Highway leading to gorgeous Malibu and Santa Monica beaches.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 705 Sq.
- Naturally-lit apartments with large windows and high ceilings
- Smart front door locks to allow guests and others to visit without sharing a key
- Plush carpeting in bedrooms and closets
- Nest learning thermostats in all units
- Custom closet designs in all walk-in closets
- Full-sized stacked washer and dryer in all units
- High-end, energy star stainless steel appliances
- Private storage closets off of balconies in select units
- All-hours lobby for meeting guests and ride-share services
- Electric Vehicle charging stations for resident's private use
- Additional storage spaces available in corridors for residents
- Executive conference room for client meetings and presentations
- Relaxing pool and spa with cabana seating
- Clubroom with pool table and demonstration kitchen
- Resident-exclusive wifi in all community spaces
- Separate studio area with On-Demand fitness classes
- Quiet business office with print and copy assistance
- Fully-outfitted fitness center with cardio equipment and weights
- Barbecue grills, fire pits, and gathering spaces for outdoor entertaining
- Secure and assigned parking space(s) for every unit
- Package Concierge system for 24/7 package pick-up
- Playroom game-space with shuffleboard, ping pong, and kegerator
